content:
Hey @Michelle (Moseman) Miller, @Lloyd McKenzie, has anyone asked for a new search parameter on servicerequest for supporting-info?
This can then be used for both chaining and _include processing.
And while I'm here, appointment calls this property supportingInformation, where serviceRequest calls it supportingInfo
OO owns ServiceRequest. The request workflow pattern names it supportingInfo, which means that Appointment might be in the minority calling it supportingInformation
That should then be ok as an update to align with workflow then right? (Thanks)
